info.name: Twisting the Hellmouth (tthfanfic.org) Redesign
info.description:
This is a complete redesign of Twisting the Hellmouth (tthfanfic.org).

This redesign touches and modernizes almost every aspect of the site.

If something isn't working, leave a comment here and I will try to update the style. If you post your own fix, you are even more awesome. If trends continue, I may post another update five years from now.

Styles are based on the Twitter Bootstrap CSS framework. And props to tthfanfic for their consistency. They've been running and looking exactly the same for at least six years now.
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE HISTORY:
2017-10-25 - Fixed some bugs in Chrome by replacing Firefox-only styles with their generic CSS3 implementations
2012-04-23 - Updated some form elements, fixed a few font issues.
